formErrors.supervisorPercentageContent: Set the supervisor percentages so that they add up to 100%
formErrors.primarySupervisor: Please select one of the supervisors as the primary supervisor
formErrors.primarySupervisorContent: Thesis must have one primary supervisor, set one of the supervisors as the primary supervisor by clicking the star icon next to the supervisor. Primary supervisor cannot be an external supervisor.
formErrors.duplicateSupervisorEmailsContent: Please check the supervisors' emails. Supervisors must have unique email addresses
formErrors.graders: Please provide missing primary grader information
formErrors.duplicateGraderEmailsContent: Please check the graders' emails. Graders must have unique email addresses
formErrors.researchPlan: Please upload a valid topic description file
formErrors.waysOfWorking: Please upload a valid ways of working file
formErrors.startDate: Start date must be before target date
formErrors.targetDate: Target date must be after start date

thesisForm.approverInstructions: Select a program manager, whose expertise is closest to the topic of the thesis, to manage the process.
thesisForm.supervisionPercentageError: Make sure the total percentages of supervisors add up to 100
thesisForm.researchPlanMissingError: Make sure you upload a topic description PDF
thesisForm.waysOfWorkingMissingError: Make sure you upload a ways of working PDF

graderInstructions.title: Instructions for filling the graders
graderInstructions.content:
Grader 1 must be a University of Helsinki professor, assistant or associate professor, research director, senior university lecturer or university lecturer.

 Grader 2 must be a doctor. Grader 2 can be a person outside the University of Helsinki.
